definition: Guilin prefecture-level city in Guangxi
cassia/laurel
surname Gui/abbr. for Guangxi Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区[Guang3 xi1 Zhuang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]
surname Lin/Japanese surname Hayashi
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
Guilin prefecture-level city in Guangxi
Guilin Medical University
Guilin precture in Guangxi

sentences.english: Solitary Beauty Peak locates in Guilin Prince City and is an integral part of the Prince City scenic area.
sentences.chinese: 獨秀峯位於桂林王城內，是王城景區不可分割的部分。

sentences.english: W: I’d like to go to Xi’an and Guilin.
Rice noodles are the most famous snack in Guilin.
sentences.chinese: 米粉是桂林久負盛名的小喫。

sentences.english: He chose an electronic company in Guilin.
sentences.chinese: 他選擇了桂林當地的一家電子公司。

sentences.english: I graduated from Guilin Institute, majoring in the professional practice of international trade.
sentences.chinese: 我畢業於桂林山水學院，主修的是國際貿易實務專業。

sentences.english: Yangshuo lies in the northeast of Guangxi Province and to the southeast of Guilin City.
sentences.chinese: 陽朔坐落於廣西省東北部，在桂林的東南面。

sentences.english: Then what about this one with Guilin's scenery?
sentences.chinese: 您看這條有桂林風景的怎麼樣？

sentences.english: Two Driug's name came off the "Yangqi Tang "on Caved Stone at Nanxi mountain in Guilin.
sentences.chinese: 桂林南溪山石刻養氣湯方有二味藥名脫落。

sentences.english: I left a message about Guilin Rice noodle is good too.
sentences.chinese: 我離開的消息對桂林米粉是好的太多。

sentences.english: Rice noodles are the most famous snack in Guilin.
sentences.chinese: 米粉是桂林久負盛名的小喫。

sentences.english: Last month, I went to Guilin and Yangshuo by train for my holiday.
sentences.chinese: 上個月放假自己坐火車去了一趟桂林和陽朔遊玩。

sentences.english: Half way up the Brightness Hill, Reed Flute Cave is seven kilometers northwest of the center of Guilin.
sentences.chinese: 半路上的亮度，蘆笛巖是西北七公里的桂林的中心。

sentences.english: Another special characteristic of Kweilin is its weirdly-shaped mountain grottoes.
sentences.chinese: 桂林的另一特點是其形態怪異的巖洞。

sentences.english: The scenery here has great charm, reminding one of the land of Guilin.
sentences.chinese: 這裏山清水秀，宛然桂林風光。

sentences.english: Then she asked whether I could take her to eat the Guilin rice noodle.
sentences.chinese: 接着她問我是否可以帶她喫桂林米粉。

sentences.english: Above all, since Ming Dynasty, it has become the symbol of Guilin history and culture, an important part in Guilin history.
sentences.chinese: 王城史是桂林歷史文化名城史的重要組成部分。
